plays.text: Penalty to Bret Hedican 2 minutes for Roughing Martin Lapointe

Penalty to Mike Knuble 2 minutes for High Sticking Glen Wesley
Penalty to Craig MacDonald 2 minutes for Obstruction - Hooking Glen Murray

Penalty to Glen Murray 2 minutes for Interference Jeff O'Neill
